about:
I am Rupapriya Naskar, an Integrated Dual Degree (B.Tech + M.Tech) student in Aerospace Engineering at IIT Kharagpur with strong focus on Machine Learning, NLP, and Data Science. I build applied ML systems that move from research to deployment.

I have worked as a Research Intern at National University of Singapore and IIT Kharagpur, and as a Data Science Intern at Chi SquareX. My work includes multilingual voter preference modeling, credit risk classification, and climate diffusion modeling for long-horizon SST generation.

I enjoy building end-to-end AI products with Python, PyTorch, scikit-learn, LangChain, Docker, AWS, and CI/CD pipelines.

Contact: +91-7047382727 | rupapriyanaskar2002@gmail.com
